verses.text:
Lift up the trum-pet, and loud let it ring; Je-sus is com-ing a-gain!
Cheer up, ye pil-grims, be joy-ful and sing; Je-sus is com-ing a-gain!

Ech-o it, hills and ye val-leys pro-claim; Je-sus is com-ing a-gain!
Ocean and earth tell the won-der-ful name; Je-sus is com-ing a-gain!

Com-ing a-gain, com-ing a-gain, Pos-si-bly morn-ing, or noon, or at night;
Com-ing a-gain, com-ing a-gain, O what a won-der-ful, glo-ri-ous sight!

chorus.text:
Je-sus is com-ing a-gain, Je-sus is com-ing a-gain,
Com-ing in pow-er and love to reign; Je-sus is com-ing a-gain!
